page.title: 03Karen Doherty moving house
page.content: Friday 21st. June 1985. I woke up to an almost empty house; the day had at last come. We were going to move to Fairview Drive Romsey. My sister went off to school. As usual something went wrong _ it was raining. But it was better than last time because the last time it was snowing. Then there was a knock at the door. It was the people to help. They had a cup of coffee and then started to move the mattresses out to the van. Then I took the headboards out to the van. After a little while they took a van load down came back and had a cup of coffee. Mum ran out of milk so I went down to the shop and got some.
